verses.verse: וַיִּמְעֲל֧וּ <S%H4603><s%> committed בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> But the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מַ֖עַל <S%H4604><s%> a trespass בַּחֵ֑רֶם <S%H2764><s%> in the accursed thing וַיִּקַּ֡ח <S%H3947><s%> took עָכָ֣ן <S%H5912><s%> for Achan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כַּרְמִי֩ <S%H3756><s%> of Carmi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זַבְדִּ֨י <S%H2067><s%> of Zabdi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זֶ֜רַח <S%H2226><s%> of Zerah לְמַטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַחֵ֔רֶם <S%H2764><s%> of the accursed thing וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> and the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> men מִֽירִיח֗וֹ <S%H3405><s%> from Jericho הָעַ֞י <S%H5857><s%> to Ai אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> which [is] beside בֵּ֥ית אָ֙וֶן֙ <S%H1007><s%> Bethaven מִקֶּ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> on the east side לְבֵֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and spake אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> and to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto them saying עֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> Go up וְרַגְּל֣וּ <S%H7270><s%> and view אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the country וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> went up הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men וַֽיְרַגְּל֖וּ <S%H7270><s%> and viewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> Ai

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> And they returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> to Joshua וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָיו֮ <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> go up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> unto him Let not all the people כְּאַלְפַּ֣יִם <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or כִּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> but let about two or three אֲלָפִ֣ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> go up וְיַכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> Ai אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּיַגַּע־ <S%H3021><s%> to labour שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> [and] make not all the people כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> thither for they [are but] few הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> So there went up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> thither of the people שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there כִּשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> about three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַיָּנֻ֕סוּ <S%H5127><s%> and they fled לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> of Ai

וַיַּכּ֨וּ <S%H5221><s%> smote מֵהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> like אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> And the men הָעַ֗י <S%H5857><s%> of Ai כִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> of them about thirty וְשִׁשָּׁה֙ <S%H8337><s%> and six אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֞וּם <S%H7291><s%> for they chased לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> them [from] before הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> the gate עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַשְּׁבָרִ֔ים <S%H7671><s%> [even] unto Shebarim וַיַּכּ֖וּם <S%H5221><s%> and smote בַּמּוֹרָ֑ד <S%H4174><s%> them in the going down וַיִּמַּ֥ס <S%H4549><s%> melted לְבַב־ <S%H3824><s%> wherefore the hearts הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> and became לְמָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> and became as water

וַיִּקְרַ֨ע <S%H7167><s%> rent יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua שִׂמְלֹתָ֗יו <S%H8071><s%> his clothes וַיִּפֹּל֩ <S%H5307><s%> and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנָ֨יו <S%H6440><s%> upon his face אַ֜רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the earth לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until the eventide ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> and put עָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> dust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֲהָ֣הּ ׀ <S%H162><s%> Alas O אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לָ֠מָה <S%H4100><s%> why הֵעֲבַ֨רְתָּ <S%H5674><s%> wherefore hast thou at all הַעֲבִ֜יר <S%H5674><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to deliver אֹתָ֛נוּ <S%H853><s%> בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> us into the hand הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites לְהַאֲבִידֵ֑נוּ <S%H6><s%> to destroy וְלוּ֙ <S%H3863><s%> us? would to God הוֹאַ֣לְנוּ <S%H2974><s%> we had been content וַנֵּ֔שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan

בִּ֖י <S%H994><s%> O אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> Lord מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֹמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> what shall I say אַ֠חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> when אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after הָפַ֧ךְ <S%H2015><s%> turneth יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עֹ֖רֶף <S%H6203><s%> their backs לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> their enemies

וְיִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <S%H3669><s%> For the Canaanites וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְנָסַ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> [of it] and shall environ us round עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and וְהִכְרִ֥יתוּ <S%H3772><s%> and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמֵ֖נוּ <S%H8034><s%> our name מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what תַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and what wilt thou do לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> our name הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> unto thy great ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua קֻ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> Get thee up לָ֑ךְ לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> he אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you נֹפֵ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> wherefore liest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> accept

חָטָא֙ <S%H2398><s%> hath sinned יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> have also עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> and they have also transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> have even לָֽקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> them for they have even taken מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַחֵ֔רֶם <S%H2764><s%> of the accursed thing וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> both גָּֽנְבוּ֙ <S%H1589><s%> and have also stolen וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> have also כִּֽחֲשׁ֔וּ <S%H3584><s%> and dissembled וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> have even שָׂ֥מוּ <S%H7760><s%> also and they have put בִכְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3627><s%> [it] even among their own stuff

וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> except יֻכְל֜וּ <S%H3201><s%> could בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Therefore the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָקוּם֙ <S%H6965><s%> not stand לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> their enemies עֹ֗רֶף <S%H6203><s%> [their] backs יִפְנוּ֙ <S%H6437><s%> [but] turned לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> their enemies כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> have become לְחֵ֑רֶם <S%H2764><s%> because they were accursed לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אוֹסִיף֙ <S%H3254><s%> neither will I be with you any more לִֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> have become עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> with אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תַשְׁמִ֛ידוּ <S%H8045><s%> ye destroy הַחֵ֖רֶם <S%H2764><s%> the accursed מִֽקִּרְבְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H7130><s%> from among

קֻ֚ם <S%H6965><s%> Up קַדֵּ֣שׁ <S%H6942><s%> sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say הִתְקַדְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H6942><s%> Sanctify לְמָחָ֑ר <S%H4279><s%> yourselves against to morrow כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כֹה֩ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> for thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חֵ֤רֶם <S%H2764><s%> [There is] an accursed thing בְּקִרְבְּךָ֙ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of thee O Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תוּכַ֗ל <S%H3201><s%> thou canst לָקוּם֙ <S%H6965><s%> not stand לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <S%H341><s%> thine enemies עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הֲסִירְכֶ֥ם <S%H5493><s%> until ye take away הַחֵ֖רֶם <S%H2764><s%> the accursed thing מִֽקִּרְבְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H7130><s%> from among

וְנִקְרַבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7126><s%> therefore ye shall be brought בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> In the morning לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7626><s%> according to your tribes וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be that הַשֵּׁבֶט֩ <S%H7626><s%> and it shall be [that] the tribe אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִלְכְּדֶ֨נּוּ <S%H3920><s%> taketh יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD יִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> shall come לַמִּשְׁפָּח֗וֹת <S%H4940><s%> according to the families וְהַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֞ה <S%H4940><s%> [thereof] and the family אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִלְכְּדֶ֤נָּה <S%H3920><s%> shall take יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD תִּקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> shall come לַבָּתִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> by households וְהַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> and the household אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִלְכְּדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H3920><s%> shall take יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD יִקְרַ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> shall come לַגְּבָרִֽים׃ <S%H1397><s%> man

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הַנִּלְכָּ֣ד <S%H3920><s%> And it shall be [that] he that is taken בַּחֵ֔רֶם <S%H2764><s%> with the accursed thing יִשָּׂרֵ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> shall be burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֑וֹ כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because עָבַר֙ <S%H5674><s%> he and all that he hath because he hath transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and because עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and because he hath wrought נְבָלָ֖ה <S%H5039><s%> folly בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֤ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיַּקְרֵ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> and brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לִשְׁבָטָ֑יו <S%H7626><s%> by their tribes וַיִּלָּכֵ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> was taken שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> and the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <S%H7126><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיִּלְכֹּ֕ד <S%H3920><s%> and he took אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַזַּרְחִ֑י <S%H2227><s%> of the Zarhites וַיַּקְרֵ֞ב <S%H7126><s%> and he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family הַזַּרְחִי֙ <S%H2227><s%> of the Zarhites לַגְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1397><s%> man וַיִּלָּכֵ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> was taken זַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H2067><s%> and Zabdi
